oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Brother Jovitus Edward with the High School Senior Class of 1924
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Students; Boys; De La Salle Christian Brothers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Top row (L-R): B. Lindquist, B. Wade, Gerald Fay, M. Wade, L. Montedonico, E. Lyle, T. J. Clarke, C. Zanone, T. Staed, L. Bowker
Middle row (L-R): Brother Jovitus Edward, T.P. Manigan, Robert Mitchell, J. Wilder, W. B. Clark, G. Wright, G. Wible, T. Wallace, Ed Kuhn, G. Welsh, K. Linder, Dan Collins, J. Montedonico
Seated (L-R): J. McDonnell, William Powers, J. Foppiano, Kavanaugh, J. Caselli, Andrews, "Speed" Lynch, Ed Kennedy
Bottom Row (L-R): Boyd Lee, Herb Pelegrin, V. McAden, Donald Furry, P. Fracchia, J. Rummaggi, F. O'Connor
In May 1924, the senior class played all the parts in "It Pays to Advertize" at the Catholic Club.
